comprehensive_overview: bamliquidator is a tool for finding biologically-relevant peak sets in high-throughput sequencing data, particularly ChIP-seq and ATAC-seq data. It helps in identifying enriched regions (peaks) by calculating the fold enrichment compared to control data.
core_features:
1. Identifying enriched regions (peaks) in ChIP-seq and ATAC-seq data
2. Calculating fold enrichment compared to control data
3. Generating statistics and visualization of peak sets
4. Providing options for customization and integration with downstream analysis tools
